text: Ten-day closure for Rhuddlan bridge - Read more at: http://www.pointfm.co.uk/ten-day-closure-for-rhuddlan-bridge/ … via @pointfmrhyl pic.twitter.com/eh90eONsGi
A closure is in effect for the Chenault Bridge at the Boyle/Garrard line (KY 3042, MP 0.05) until further notice due to deck deterioration
